tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE drug_expiration_dates (
  drug_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  drug_name VARCHAR(255),
  expiration_date DATE,
  storage_condition VARCHAR(100)
)
CREATE TABLE Drug (drug_id INT PRIMARY KEY, drug_name VARCHAR(255), expiration_date DATE);
CREATE TABLE ExpirationLog (log_id INT PRIMARY KEY, drug_id INT, expiration_date DATE, log_description TEXT);

CREATE TABLE Orders (
  order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  drug_id INT,
  quantity INT NOT NULL,
  order_date DATE NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (drug_id) REFERENCES Drugs(drug_id)
);

CREATE TABLE QualityTests (
  test_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  drug_id INT,
  test_date DATE NOT NULL,
  test_result VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (drug_id) REFERENCES Drugs(drug_id)
);
